  • Method Details

    • writeReview

      public static void writeReview(models.User sessionUser) throws Exception
      Allows current User to write one review for one movie

      Contains a User Interface that first asks the user for the movie they would like to review. This method collects the rating and the worded review of the user.

      Each movie can only be reviewed once by the user. This method allows the user to change their existing review by selecting the same movie to review

      Parameters:
      sessionUser - Current User object logged into the system
      Throws:
      Exception
      See Also:
      • Movie

    • viewReview

      public static void viewReview(models.Movie moviechosen) throws Exception
      Method to show the existing reviews of a movie. This method is called when the user wishes to see details of that movie.

      Contains a User Interface that returns the list of ratings and reviews for the movie chosen by the user. Also show who made the review by returning the name of the user who made that review.

      Parameters:
      moviechosen - Movie to check the reviews for
      Throws:
      Exception
      See Also:
      • Staff#loggedin(String)
      • Movie
